attributes.action: explain why he is personally intervening in the case of Madeleine McCann; unless he intervenes personally in the case of ALL missing British children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think this is fairly self-explanatory; I would simply add that if Mr. Brown does NOT already intervene in all such cases he should either start doing so or stop intervening in Madeleine's case.  He is the Prime Minister of ALL Britons; not just some!

rejection.details:
Please write to the Prime Minister direct at the following address:

10 Downing Street, 
London, 
SW1A 2AA
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
